briefTitle: Comparison of a New Formulation of Insulin Glargine With Lantus in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes on Basal Insulin With Oral Antidiabetic Therapy
officialTitle: 6-Month, Multicenter, Randomized, Open-label, Parallel-group Study Comparing the Efficacy and Safety of a New Formulation of Insulin Glargine and LantusÂ® Both in Combination With Oral Antihyperglycemic Drug(s) in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus With a 6-month Safety Extension Period
summary:
Primary Objective:

* To compare the efficacy of insulin glargine new formulation and Lantus in terms of change in Glycated Hemoglobin A1c (HbA1c) from baseline to endpoint (scheduled Month 6) in adult participants with type 2 diabetes mellitus

Secondary Objective:

* To compare the efficacy of insulin glargine new formulation and Lantus in terms of occurrence of nocturnal hypoglycemia

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in HbA1c From Baseline to Month 6 Endpoint
